article:
Events and trends
* 928 BCâOn the death of King Solomon, his son Rehoboam is unable to hold the
  tribes of Israel together, and the northern part secedes to become the
  kingdom of Israel, making Jeroboam its king. Rehoboam was left to rule the
  kingdom of Judah.
* 925 BCâMilitary conquest of Canaan by Shoshenq I.
* 922 BCâOsorkon I succeeds his father Shoshenq I as king of Egypt.
* 922 BCâPhorbas, Archon of Athens, dies after a reign of 30 years and is
  succeeded by his son Megacles.
